app-IR-receiver/megaEIBdecode.h

00001 //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00002 // EIB decoding table for EIB frames
00003 //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00004 // 10.Dec.03   MDf   created
00005 //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00006 
00007 #ifndef _INCLUDE_EIBDECODE_
00008 #define _INCLUDE_EIBDECODE_
00009 
00010 //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00011 
00012 typedef struct
00013 {
00014    unsigned short  wEIBcmd;          // schematic command
00015    unsigned short  wFrameMask;       // AND-bitmask
00016    unsigned short  wFrameCode;       // resulting code
00017 }
00018 EIBNET_DECODER;
00019 
00020 //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00021 // This is used to decode Byte.7 and Byte.8 (TPCI/APCI) of an
00022 // EIB message. These bytes are treated as WORD, &
00023 //-----------------------------------------------------------------
00024 
00025 #define EIB_CMD_COUNT   42
00026 
00027 EIBNET_DECODER EIBdecodeTable[EIB_CMD_COUNT] =
00028 {
00029    {EIBNET_VALUE_READ,           0xFFC0, 0x0000},
00030    {EIBNET_VALUE_RSP,            0xFFC0, 0x0040},
00031    {EIBNET_VALUE_WRITE,          0xFFC0, 0x0080},
00032                                          
00033    {EIBNET_WRITE_PHYSADDR,       0xFFFF, 0x00C0},
00034    {EIBNET_READ_PHYSADDR_REQ,    0xFFFF, 0x0100},
00035    {EIBNET_READ_PHYSADDR_RSP,    0xFFFF, 0x0140},
00036                                          
00037    {EIBNET_READ_SERNO_REQ,       0xFFFF, 0x03DC},
00038    {EIBNET_READ_SERNO_RSP,       0xFFFF, 0x03DD},
00039    {EIBNET_SET_SERNO_REQ,        0xFFFF, 0x03DE},
00040                                          
00041    {EIBNET_SERVICE_INFO_REQ,     0xFFFF, 0x03DF},
00042                                          
00043    {EIBNET_READ_ADC_REQ,         0xFFC0, 0x4180},
00044    {EIBNET_READ_ADC_RSP,         0xFFC0, 0x41C0},
00045                                          
00046    {EIBNET_READ_MEM_REQ,         0xFFF0, 0x4200},
00047    {EIBNET_READ_MEM_RSP,         0xFFF0, 0x4240},
00048    {EIBNET_WRITE_MEM_REQ,        0xFFF0, 0x4280},
00049                                          
00050    {EIBNET_USR_READ_MEM_REQ,     0xFFFF, 0x42C0},
00051    {EIBNET_USR_READ_MEM_RSP,     0xFFFF, 0x42C1},
00052    {EIBNET_USR_WRITE_MEM_REQ,    0xFFFF, 0x42C2},
00053    {EIBNET_USR_WRITE_MEMBIT_REQ, 0xFFFF, 0x42C4},
00054                                          
00055    {EIBNET_USR_READ_MFACT_REQ,   0xFFFF, 0x42C5},
00056    {EIBNET_USR_READ_MFACT_RSP,   0xFFFF, 0x42C6},
00057                                          
00058    {EIBNET_READ_MASKVERSION_REQ, 0xFFC0, 0x4300},
00059    {EIBNET_READ_MASKVERSION_RSP, 0xFFC0, 0x4340},
00060                                          
00061    {EIBNET_RESTART_REQ,          0xFFC0, 0x4380},
00062                                          
00063    {EIBNET_WRITE_MEMBIT_REQ,     0xFFFF, 0x43D0},
00064                                          
00065    {EIBNET_AUTHORIZE_REQ,        0xFFFF, 0x43D1},
00066    {EIBNET_AUTHORIZE_RSP,        0xFFFF, 0x43D2},
00067                                          
00068    {EIBNET_SETKEY_REQ,           0xFFFF, 0x43D3},
00069    {EIBNET_SETKEY_RSP,           0xFFFF, 0x43D4},
00070                                          
00071    {EIBNET_PROPERTY_VALUE_READ,  0xFFFF, 0x43D5},
00072    {EIBNET_PROPERTY_VALUE_RSP,   0xFFFF, 0x43D6},
00073    {EIBNET_PROPERTY_VALUE_WRITE, 0xFFFF, 0x43D7},
00074                                          
00075    {EIBNET_PROPERTY_DESCR_READ,  0xFFFF, 0x43D8},
00076    {EIBNET_PROPERTY_DESCR_RSP,   0xFFFF, 0x43D9},
00077                                          
00078    {EIBNET_OPEN,                 0xFF00, 0x8000},
00079    {EIBNET_CLOSE,                0xFF00, 0x8001},
00080    {EIBNET_OPEN_CONF,            0xFF00, 0x8002},
00081    {EIBNET_reserved,             0xFF00, 0x8003},
00082    {EIBNET_reserved,             0xFF00, 0xC000},
00083    {EIBNET_CLOSE_CONF,           0xFF00, 0xC001},
00084    {EIBNET_TL_ACK,               0xFF00, 0xC002},
00085    {EIBNET_TL_NACK,              0xFF00, 0xC003}
00086 };
